body_html: @sandipmgiri - The test passes if you use 1.9.0rc0 tag because it didn't have support for uint8_t datatype, moreover the test file resize_bilinear_test.cc itself didn't include any tests for uint8_t datatype. The support for generic datatype was added later in the commit 4f91202 and so are the new tests in the resize_bilinear_test which are failing for me on ppc64le.
body_text: @sandipmgiri - The test passes if you use 1.9.0rc0 tag because it didn't have support for uint8_t datatype, moreover the test file resize_bilinear_test.cc itself didn't include any tests for uint8_t datatype. The support for generic datatype was added later in the commit 4f91202 and so are the new tests in the resize_bilinear_test which are failing for me on ppc64le.
body: @sandipmgiri - The test passes if you use 1.9.0rc0 tag because it didn't have support for uint8_t datatype, moreover the test file resize_bilinear_test.cc itself didn't include any tests for uint8_t datatype. The support for generic datatype was added later in the commit https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/4f912021b04f5f82b0d1a6bba5b32a24d7cb9fca and so are the new tests in the resize_bilinear_test which are failing for me on ppc64le.
